summary: A thriller set at the beginning of the 1980's Norwegian Oil Boom and centered on a diver whose obsession with reaching the bottom of the Norwegian Sea leads to tragedy.
cast: Aksel Hennie|Wes Bentley|Stephen Lang|Stephanie Sigman|Jonathan LaPaglia|Ane Dahl Torp|Jørgen Langhelle|André Eriksen|David A. Jørgensen|Eirik Stubø|Endre Hellestveit|Laurents Rørvik|Janne Heltberg|Jerker Fahlström|Tyrone C. Wiggins|Thomas Hedengran|Jan Gunnar Sjøthun|Arne Lindtner Næss|Robin Hayes|Eric C. Westerstrøm|Peter Sjøgren
title: Pionér
